refnamediv.refpurpose: Sets the default region attributes used by the r and c commands when building a BRL-CAD region.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: Sets the default region attributes used by the r and c commands when building a BRL-CAD region. The default ident number is incremented each time a new region is created with the r or c commands.

refsection.title: EXAMPLES
refsection.para: The example shows the use of the regdef command to set the default region attributes used by the r and c commands when building a BRL-CAD region.

example.title: Set region default attributes.
example.para: Sets the region default attributes to an ident of 1003, an air code of 0, an los of 100%, and a material code of 8.
